entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon then north 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
